main event: On May 24, 1952, a shiny round object was observed in the sky by a couple near Santa Rosa, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as stationary for about 2 minutes before disappearing to the southeast at high speed., The sighting was corroborated by both the husband and wife who were driving at the time., The object was reported as shiny, round, and moving rapidly in the sky., The incident was documented as part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings., The report indicated that the object was clearly identified as 'Unidentified' by the investigators.
sighted object: a shiny round object in the sky
witness description: A couple driving on U.S. Highway 66.
